B1 the day on which an important event happened in a previous year: We always celebrate our wedding anniversary with dinner in an expensive restaurant. Tomorrow is the 30th anniversary of the revolution.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are planning a dinner to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the founding of the company.Tomorrow's parade will mark the 50th anniversary of the battle.We went for a slap-up meal on our wedding anniversary.It was their 25th wedding anniversary last week.On this anniversary of the tragedy we remember the living as well as the dead.
